data.actual_result: the system cant adjust the system call volume settings
data.expected_result: the system should adjust the call volume settings even the phone is in sleep mode
data.short_description: volume controls not working properly when the phone sleeps
data.steps_to_repro: - join in an active voice channel - (optional) adjust your volume control to your desired level - put phone to sleep - adjust volume control lower to the original after your phone sleeps
